resources.string: We need notification access granted to use flash alert on incoming notification event
Camera permission is needed to turn on your phone flashlight during incoming calls or notifications

App need at least one of these permission to be of any use. Read Phone state lets us use flashlight during incoming call while Notification Access let us to lighting effect to notify you when new Notification arrives.
Read Phone State and Notification Access Permission
Permission needed to help you track your messenger open rates
Permission needed to enable quick access to app from anywhere
